oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Civil War veterans reunion
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Back row L-R: Nancy Jane (officer), Henry Clay Snodgrass, Polk Fancer, Carrol Henderson Clark, Fate Quarles, Cleve Rogers, Virginia Fancher, Roberta Hill. Bottom row L-R: Ann Poteet Broyles, Wayman Leftwich Dibrell, Solomon Sparkman, Nelson Hyder,; Wiley Steakly, John Jacob Robinson. Photograph taken in Sparta and may show veterans of George Dibrell's 8th Tenn. Cav. Regt., CSA. There is a Confederate flag with Dibrell's name to the right.
